item.title: "Adopt a Spec" Program for JUGs
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: This program is intended to encourage JUG leaders and members to get involved by adopting a Jakarta EE Specification. The objective is to increase developer level participation in the evolution of the Jakarta EE Specification. Adopters How JUG leaders can help: Ensure that the topic of the adopted Jakarta EE Specification is consistently discussed, e.
